channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: For United, the 28,000 flight attendants have demanded doubl
item.description: For United, the 28,000 flight attendants have demanded double-digit pay increases, pay for time at work—including when they're on the ground—and retroactive pay. They are also asking for increased schedule flexibility, retirement benefits, and job security.

item.title: Backpage .com founder Michael Lacey sentenced to 5 years in
item.description: Backpage .com founder Michael Lacey sentenced to 5 years in prison, fined $3M for money laundering.

item.title: #BREAKING: Overnight stay at Grand Canyon hotels and lodges
item.description: #BREAKING: Overnight stay at Grand Canyon hotels and lodges is closed starting tomorrow and strict water restrictions are being put in place due to waterline breaks.
